content: ditto by anne g sizes youth/aduls s m/l fits head circumference 21/22 23/24 inches around materials  size 4mm 6 us 16 circular needles  size 4 5mm 7 us 16 circular needles and double pointed needles or size needed for gauge  approx 100 140 metres 110 155 yds for single brim or 135 175 metres 150 190 yds for folded brim of worsted / aran weight yarn  cable needle  one stitch marker and yarn needle gauge 28 rounds in 2 x 2 rib stitch with bigger needles = 10 cm 4 * because of the ribbing this hat is quite stretchy and forgiving so you don t need to worry too much about the stitch gauge the row count however is important to achieve the right length for your hat if need be you can make adjustments by changing needle size and/or knitting more or less set-up row after the ribbing keep in mind that the body part of the hat is 28 32 row check your number of row per inch and make necessary adjustments if necessary to achieve the length needed notes - i like the elastic long-tail cast-on also known as german twisted cast-on it is fast and gives a very nice elastic edge you can find video tutorials on youtube if you are not familiar with this technique - this hat is knit brim to crown charts are worked from right to left each round of both the charted and the written instructions must be repeated around for a total of five six times 5 6 sections key & abbreviations d co - cast on p2tog purl two together z round - round no stitch h s k - knit ssk slip slip knit g v p - purl sk2p slip 1 k2 decrease pass slipped stitch over 2sts knit decrease d <yu> k2tog knit two together c2b slip 2 sts on cable needle at back g s1wyib slip one with yarn in back k2 k2 from cable needle s2wyib slip two with yarn in back directions cast on 90 108 sts with smaller needles using elastic long-tail or preferred stretchy method place marker and join to work in the round being careful not to twist the stitches work as follows round 1 k1 p1 around repeat round 1 until ribbing measures single brim 2 ¼ inches folded brim 5 inches body charts a and b change to bigger needles and knit as follows repeating each section around to marker set-up row k8 p2 k2 p2 twice chart a set-up row size m repeat set-up row three more times for a total of four row g g g g g g size l repeat set-up row seven more times for a total of eight row chart b body continue with chart b round 1 k4 c2b p2 k2 p2 twice g g g g g g 13 g g g g g g 12 round 2 k4 s2wyib k2 p2 k2 p2
